entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Roberval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roberval Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
